entry.title: Set Time Synchronization on ArchLinux
entry.content:
Find out if current system time setup and services status is corrent: timedatectl status. If not, run these commands as root to set correct timezne and sync time with Internet. “`

ln -s /usr/share/zoneinfo/Hongkong /etc/localtime

hwclock –systohc –utc

systemctl enable systemd-timesyncd.service

systemctl start systemd-timesyncd.service

“`

Ref: Time - ArchWiki
